definition: to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots

sentences.english: Because of the birthmark, everybody knows exactly how much longer they've got.
sentences.chinese: 因为有胎记预示，大家都知道他们还剩下多少时间。

sentences.english: Why was "Ambrose His Mark" not your favorite?
sentences.chinese: 为什么你们都不喜欢《安伯罗斯他的胎记》是吗？

sentences.english: McDull is a male pig who can be distinguished by a birthmark on his right eye.
sentences.chinese: 外语培训麦兜是一只右眼上有个胎记的小猪。

sentences.english: Two dark and red birthmarks cross but become inclined ten wordses.
sentences.chinese: 两道暗红的胎记，交叉而成斜十字。

sentences.english: One kind is hemangioma or vascular malformation, laser quyu birthmarks effect is good.
sentences.chinese: 一类是血管瘤或血管畸形，激光祛胎记效果好。

sentences.english: The moles and birthmarks in these areas can indicate good fortune, or a lack of it.
sentences.chinese: 痣或胎记落到这些区域有可能象征好运或时运不济。

sentences.english: Laser treatments do not permanently remove birthmarks known as port-wine stains, researchers have found.
sentences.chinese: 研究人员发现，激光不能永久性去除葡萄酒色痣胎记。

sentences.english: "Everybody knows about the birthmark, " the bartender says.
sentences.chinese: “每个人都知道你的胎记，”男招待说。

sentences.english: I said to the medical student, you must not see a lot of birthmarks ;around here.
sentences.chinese: 我对那个学生说，你们这儿的人没见过胎记么。

sentences.english: "You have a birthmark, Mr. Durden, " the bartender says. "On your foot.
sentences.chinese: “你有个胎记，歌顿先生，”男招待说“在你脚上。

sentences.english: Birthmarks tuyuhun birth exists or born appeared after the congenital skin lesions.
sentences.chinese: 胎记泛指出生时存在或出生后出现的先天性皮肤损害。

sentences.english: I have a birthmark on my right eye.
sentences.chinese: 我右眼上长着一块胎记。

sentences.english: A pregnant woman must eat the right food, or she will give her child an unwanted birthmark.
sentences.chinese: 孕妇须选择适当的食物，否则生下的孩子会有胎记。

sentences.english: What method of removal of birthmarks is best?
sentences.chinese: 什么方法去除胎记最好呢？
